sentences.sentence: He has accused local people of trying to besmirch his reputation.
sentences.translation: 他指责当地人企图败坏他的名誉。

sentences.sentence: Soda acid liquid cannot be used when cleaning besmirch.
sentences.translation: 清洗污渍时不可使用酸碱液体。

sentences.sentence: He had deliberately set out to besmirch her reputation.
sentences.translation: 他是有意损害她的名声。
